hooks.command: COMMAND=$(jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty'); if echo "$COMMAND" | grep -q '^git commit'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && { npm run lint 2>&1 | tail -20; npm test 2>&1 | tail -20; } || { echo '{"decision": "deny", "reason": "Tests or linting failed. Fix issues before committing."}' >&2; exit 2; }; fi; exit 0
